Milestones
================

#. Submit the first version SRS of OMG - May 1st
#. Implement the key function - May 8th
#. Test the function - May 10th
#. Implement the web page - May 20th
#. Test the pages - May 21st
#. Complete the functions and the pages, fix the bugs - May 25th
#. Release the first version - May 26th
#. Test the release version - May 27th
#. Deploy on a server - May 29th
